title: Calories in 1 Cup Cooked Rice
meta_description: Discover calories in rice cooked 1 cup, including carbs, protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: White long-grain rice, cooked in water without added fat, salt, or seasonings; ~158 g per cup.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by rice type, brand, cooking method, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of cooked white rice provides ~206 kcal and ~45 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Fried in 1 tsp oil per cup

faqs.q: How many calories in rice cooked 1 cup?
faqs.a: About 206 kcal for one cup of plain cooked white rice.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in 1 cup cooked rice?
faqs.a: Approximately 44.5 g carbs, mostly starch with minimal fiber.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in cooked rice?
faqs.a: Yes—boiling plain keeps it low-cal; frying or adding oil/butter increases by 30–50 kcal per cup.

faqs.q: How much protein in 1 cup of cooked rice?
faqs.a: Roughly 4.3 g protein per cup of white rice.

faqs.q: Is brown rice lower calorie than white per cup cooked?
faqs.a: No, brown is slightly higher at ~218 kcal per cup due to more fiber and nutrients.
